title: Task Automation & Management
description: Automate repetitive tasks and reminders for litigation GST cases with intelligent workflows
overview: The Task Automation & Management page provides comprehensive automation tools for creating, managing, and tracking tasks throughout your legal practice. It enables rule-based automation, escalation workflows, template management, and intelligent task scheduling to ensure no deadlines are missed and work flows efficiently.
